item.description: On Monday, December 20, starting at 7:15p, The Disproof Atheism Society will present “Atheism and the Principle of Sufficient Reason,” a talk by Kyle Szklenski arguing against this famous principle on which many proofs of God’s existence depend, based in part on John Post’s “How to Refute Principles of Sufficient Reason” (1999). Location: Rm. 442 of the BU Photonics Center, 8 St. Mary’s St., Boston. Free & open to the public. More info: DASociety@aol.com.
item.name: Disproof Atheism Society: Atheism and the Principle of Sufficient Reason
